reused_details.reused: President Vladimir Putin says Russia will refuse to sell oil to any country that imposes the Wests stupid price cap on its oil.
reused_by_aic: Russia will not sell oil to any country that imposes a price cap on its oil exports and is considering reducing its oil production, President Vladimir Putin says.

reused_details.reused: The Group of Seven major powers, the EU and Australia last week agreed a $60 per barrel price cap on Russian seaborne crude oil after EU members overcame resistance from Poland.
